definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
union of religious and political rule/theocracy/Caesaropapism
civilians and the military (working) hand in hand (idiom)

sentences.english: I believed that the mixture of religion and politics was dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 意思是說政教合一是非常危險的。

sentences.english: Feel how you are coming into s state of Balance with the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 感受你現在進入到一種與地球完全合一的全然狀態。

sentences.english: Integrate human and culture, beautify environment.
Metaphysically speaking, good results in oneness, and evil results in a sense of separation.
sentences.chinese: 純粹說來，善良產生合一，邪惡產生分離。

sentences.english: After the "three in one", the enterprise wants to cancel the operation?
sentences.chinese: 三證合一”之後，企業想要註銷該如何操作？

sentences.english: Wash protect furniture will be pushed off as a new function in Rejoice series.
sentences.chinese: 洗護二合一將會是飄柔推出的產品中新的功能。

sentences.english: It is mainly used in high-performance two-in-one crusher.
sentences.chinese: 用於高效式二合一破碎機。

sentences.english: The general principle of Chinese world view and culture is the harmony between the heaven and human.
sentences.chinese: 中國的宇宙觀和文化總綱是天人合一。

sentences.english: The idea of spirit body combination is the core of TCM theory of combining body with spirit.
sentences.chinese: “形神合一論”是中醫心身統一思想的核心內容。

sentences.english: We have "six-in, " one can do for humanity?
sentences.chinese: 我們“六合一”人能爲人類做點什麼？

sentences.english: Unifying the singing-to-reply and presenting-answer functions as one, his poems had the function of letters concurrently.
sentences.chinese: 同時，其將唱和與贈答功能合一，兼有書信作用。

sentences.english: The outcome ranges between a total disaster and a terrible heart ache to wonderful love stories that are pure, genuine, emotional-fulfilling and highly sexual.
sentences.chinese: 結果不外乎就是災難心痛分手和靈慾合一的真愛之間。

sentences.english: From the analysis of jurisprudence, the syncretism of civil commercial law is a historical trend.
sentences.chinese: 從法理上分析，民商合一是歷史發展的趨勢。

sentences.english: The Council of Vienne was the 15th ecumenical council of the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 安理會的維埃納省，是十五合一會，羅馬天主教教堂。

sentences.english: Dachang Industrial Park is located in Xiadian township, the township has the characteristics of unity.
sentences.chinese: 大廠工業園區位於夏墊鎮區，具有鎮區合一的特點。

sentences.english: Train of thought for preliminary design of chimney-cooling tower integrated projects in our country has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹國內某電廠煙塔合一工程的初步設計思路。

definition: to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
oneness of heaven and humanity/the theory that man is an integral part of nature
a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
Sanchong or Sanch'ung city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/Mie Prefecture in central Japan
to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
